summary: Phase 1 Bug Fixes Testing Complete - All 7 features verified working correctly

minor.issue: Returns duplicate formatos from database (6 duplicates found)
minor.note: Frontend handles deduplication correctly - UI shows no duplicates

passed_tests: Login redirect: @leaderlix.com users correctly redirect to /prospect/1-1-1-1-molecules (Dashboard)
Registration block: @leaderlix.com emails show error 'Registration with @leaderlix.com emails is not allowed. Please use Login instead.'
LMS dropdowns: Format, Focus, Level dropdowns show NO duplicates (frontend deduplication working)
LMS public view link: Published courses show external link icon that opens /learn/course/:id
Blog public view link: Published posts show external link icon that opens /blog/:slug
Time Tracker page: Shows functional native React UI with stats, session table, and Log Time dialog - NOT 'Preview Unavailable'
Certificate generation: Dialog shows email search, program dropdown, level dropdown, hours input, and generate button
critical_code_review_comments: Backend /api/lms/options returns duplicate formatos from database - consider adding deduplication at API level for consistency

success_rate.backend: 94% (16/17 tests passed - 1 minor issue with duplicate data in DB)

context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 1 bug fixes all verified working. Key routes: /nurture/lms for LMS, /nurture/blog for Blog, /deliver/time-tracker for Time Tracker, /deliver/certificates for Certificates. Login redirect logic in Login.jsx correctly routes @leaderlix.com users to dashboard and blocks registration. Frontend deduplicates LMS dropdown options using Map pattern.

registration_block.error_message: Registration with @leaderlix.com emails is not allowed. Please use Login instead.

lms_dropdowns.note: Backend returns duplicates but frontend deduplicates correctly
